de: Um einen besonderen Moment in einem außergewöhnlichen Rahmen zu erleben, bietet Ihnen L'Echappée Mer auf Anfrage Ausflüge auf dem Meer auf einem 12-Meter-Boot ab Sainte Maxime an.
en:
as part of the ship L'Échappée Bleue, which has a licence from the Marchande et Armée au Commerce Centre de Sécurité des Navires de Marine.

> Special cruise
600 euros for half a day and 990 euros for a full day.
includes fuel for the region of Golfe de St. Tropez.

Spend a half-day lounging on a comfortable boat with friends, family, or coworkers and cherish a unique moment. At any time, you can drop anchor in a peaceful cove, on the edge of a small island, or away from the bustle of the beaches. Enjoy a refreshing swim, explore the sea below with a mask and snorkel, or simply relax and enjoy the sun on the flybridge.

...................................................................................................> Sunset cruise: $70 per person (minimum of 6).
Enjoy the balmy evening as it fades into the sunset while touring the Golfe de Saint Tropez. A cheese and charcuterie platter is served during the aperitif dinner. You can buy a seafood platter individually.
We provide a squid fishing aperitif in the winter. There are fishing rods for cuttlefish. Leave after 17 hours.
...................................................................................................
> The Tour du Golfe
Explore the Golfe de Saint Tropez . Port Grimaud, Saint Tropez, Baie des Canebiers, Le Cap, and its renowned homes are all included in this four-hour tour (which includes guide commentary) before heading back to Sainte-Maxime via La Madrague. 500 euros for a boat's privatisation.
................................................................
> Exploring the offshore marine environment
Private boat excursion for five hours 1,500 euros
 A five-hour private tour to discover the marine environment, with the chance to observe whales, dolphins, pilot whales, and rorquals.
Eight persons at most.
.................................................................
 > On request or outside of the summer, inshore fishing is possible.
€600 for a six-hour boat rental. If you sail outside the Golfe de St. Tropez, you will be charged more for fuel.
 For seasoned fishermen, consider hiring a boat or doing an activity search. possibility of engaging in activities while being supervised by a fishing guide.
.................................................................................
>To satisfy all of your needs, L'Échappée Mer provides customised boat trips.
During the off-season, L'Échappée Mer, a merchant vessel registered with the French Merchant Navy, can be rented out for professional purposes such as filming, zone whitening, and nautical labour.
it: Per un'esperienza indimenticabile, a bordo di una barca di 12 metri, Echappée Mer propone escursioni privati in mare disponibili dal porto di Sainte-Maxime.
fr: Pour vivre un moment privilégié dans un cadre exceptionnel, L’Echappée Mer vous propose des sorties en mer à la demande sur un bateau de 12 mètres au départ de Sainte Maxime.
es: Para vivir un momento privilegiado en un entorno excepcional, L'Echappée Mer le ofrece excursiones marítimas a la carta en un barco de 12 metros desde Sainte Maxime.
nl: Om een bevoorrecht moment in een uitzonderlijke omgeving te beleven, biedt L'Echappée Mer u op aanvraag zeetochten op een boot van 12 meter vanuit Sainte Maxime.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de tourisme de Sainte Maxime

de: Außerhalb der Sommersaison auf Anfrage geöffnet
en: Open outside the summer season on request
it: Aperto al di fuori della stagione estiva su richiesta
fr: Ouvert hors saison estivale sur demande
nl: Buiten het zomerseizoen op aanvraag geopend
es: Abierto fuera de la temporada de verano previa petición
